english.segment1: I am yours; you are mine. Believe in you, friend of mine. You're not fading in my eyes. Could you stay? Could you stay?
english.segment2: [Chorus:]. We must hold onto our faith in each other. We must let go of our pain, yeah I say. We must hold onto our faith in each other. Gotta still believe in each other.
english.segment3: Time is short to live the life. Don't give up, friend of mine. Strength to rise one more time. Could you stand? Could you stand?
english.segment5: It's okay to feel weak. It's okay to fall down. It's okay to lose sight. But we gotta believe and stand together.
